q: Do I need to sign in to register?
a: No backend is used. The registration page is a static demo form per SRS.

q: Where does event data come from?
a: All content is read from local JSON files in /public/data.
Yes, bookmarks are stored locally in your browser.

q: How do I find department-specific events?
a: Use the category pills, search bar, or go to the Events page filters.
